pendingTipText.message: Any tip you make will remain pending and retry automatically for 90 days. $link_begin$Learn more$link_end$

pendingTipTitle.message: This creator is not signed up yet.

pendingTipTitleRegistered.message: This creator is currently not configured to receive tips from your Rewards custodial wallet service.

grantCaptchaTitle.message: Confirm you are a human being

grantCaptchaHint.message: Drag the BAT icon to the $hint$ target.

grantCaptchaPassedTextUGP.message: Your token grant is on its way.

grantCaptchaPassedTextAds.message: Your Reward is on its way.

grantCaptchaErrorTitle.message: Oops, something is wrong. Please try again later.

grantCaptchaErrorText.message: Brave Rewards is having an issue. Please try again later.

rewardsPaymentProcessing.message: Your $amount$ $month$ rewards are on the way. Keep an eye out!

walletPendingText.message: There is a temporary problem verifying with $provider$. Your Brave Rewards will remain in a Pending state and retry automatically, but you can also try again later.

notificationAddFundsText.message: Your Brave Rewards account is waiting for a deposit.

notificationBackupWalletText.message: Please back up your Brave Rewards.

notificationWalletDisconnectedText.message: This can happen to keep your account secure. Click below to reconnect now.

notificationWalletVerifiedText.message: Your Brave Rewards was successfully verified with $provider$.

notificationInsufficientFundsText.message: Your scheduled monthly payment for Auto-Contribute and monthly tips could not be completed due to insufficient funds. We’ll try again in 30 days.

notificationMonthlyContributionFailedTex.message: There was a problem processing your contribution.

notificationMonthlyTipCompletedText.message: Your monthly tips have been processed.

notificationPendingTipFailedText.message: You have pending tips due to insufficient funds

onboardingEarnText.message: Earn tokens by viewing privacy-respecting ads and support your favorite sites and content creators automatically.

onboardingSetupAdsHeader.message: How often do you want to see ads?

onboardingSetupContributeHeader.message: How much monthly support do you want to give to your favorite creators?

onboardingTerms.message: By proceeding, you agree to the $tos_link_begin$Terms of Service$tos_link_end$ and $pp_link_begin$Privacy Policy$pp_link_end$.

onboardingPanelWelcomeText.message: Brave Private Ads reward you with tokens to support content creators unlike traditional ads, all while keeping your personal information private.

onboardingPanelAdsText.message: Brave Private Ads will appear as a normal notification. You control how often you see these ads in settings.

onboardingPanelScheduleText.message: Your earned tokens from Brave Private Ads throughout the current month will arrive on the 5th of the next month.

onboardingPanelAcText.message: Creators receive your token contributions automatically based on your engagement levels that we measure as ‘Attention’.

onboardingPanelTippingText.message: Tipping is a way to personally encourage and support content or creators that you love. Get tippin!

onboardingPanelRedeemHeader.message: What can you do with tokens?

onboardingPanelRedeemText.message: Tokens can be used beyond supporting creators. You can buy digital content and other goods as merchants come onboard.

onboardingPanelSetupHeader.message: Lastly, let’s get you set up on the basic settings

onboardingPanelCompleteText.message: By using Brave Rewards you are helping make the web a better place for everyone. And that’s awesome!

onboardingPanelVerifySubtext.message: In order to withdraw the BAT you earn for viewing ads, you’ll need to verify Brave Rewards.

onboardingPanelBitflyerNote.message: The bitFlyer wallet is a service managed by bitFlyer, Inc.

onboardingPanelBitflyerText.message: By verifying your Brave Rewards and linking it to a bitFlyer account, you will be able to store and manage the BAT you have earned through Brave Rewards more easily

onboardingPanelBitflyerLearnMore.message: $link_begin$Learn more$link_end$ about how to link your Brave browser with your bitFlyer account.

captchaMaxAttemptsExceededText.message: Looks like this is not working, Brave ads will remain paused. Contact us if you need help with the captcha.

captchaSolvedText.message: Ads and earnings will now resume. Thanks for helping us protect Brave Rewards and privacy-based ads.

braveTalkTurnOnRewardsToStartCall.message: To start a free call, turn on Brave Rewards

braveTalkBraveRewardsDescription.message: With Brave Rewards, you earn tokens for viewing private ads (your data is safe). Turn those tokens into cash, gift cards…or even tip the websites you love. No tracking. No slow downs.

braveTalkOptInRewardsTerms.message: By enabling, you agree to the $tos_link_begin$Terms of Service$tos_link_end$ and $pp_link_begin$Privacy Policy$pp_link_end$.

braveTalkTurnOnPrivateAdsToStartCall.message: To start a free call, enable Brave Private Ads

braveTalkPrivateAdsDescription.message: With Brave Private Ads, you earn tokens for viewing private ads (your data is safe). Turn those tokens into cash, gift cards…or even tip the websites you love. No tracking. No slow downs.

braveTalkCanStartFreeCall.message: You can now start a free call

braveTalkClickAnywhereToBraveTalk.message: Click or tap anywhere on the screen to continue to Brave Talk.

braveTalkWantLearnMore.message: Want to learn more about Brave Rewards? $tour_link_begin$Take a quick tour$tour_link_end$.
